item.title: Talking about Big O Notation
item.description: Hello everyone ! After few week ago break to writing a blog and trying to re-learn about Data Structures and Algorithms, here I would like to share one thing that I think is important to how analysis performance some algorithms, ya Big-O notation (read with an O, not a zero). Honestly, there are so many method to analyze performance some algorithm, but here I only share the most method that we usually use to analyze an algorithm.
